title: Hello im planning on buying a refurbished phone from a verified seller, is it a wise choice? I
content: I'm currently in contact with a seller who says he has a few pristine condition pixel 2 xl, he's got a lot of good reviews and seems knowledgeable, is it a good idea to go for it? He tells me the phone is under Google warranty but I'm not sure whether to trust him or just buy.off someone selling their old phone they don't want anymore, please help
